description: You can't go wrong with a rich rogan josh curry with meatballs and fragrant spices. You'll want to mop up every last drop with the garlic naan.
name: Rogan josh meatball curry with naan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Greek-style yoghurt (plus extra to serve)
0.25 bunch coriander, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add meatballs and cook, turning, for 5 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a plate.

Add onion, garlic and ginger to pan. Cook, stirring, for 4 minutes or until softened. Add paste and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until fragrant. Add tomatoes, 3/4 cup water and meatballs and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes or until meatballs are cooked through and sauce thickens slightly.
Warm naan according to packet instructions. Top curry with yoghurt and coriander. Serve with naan.
